|- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(csmblfn, c2)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, csalg))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, cuni(c2)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cv(s1))), co(c2, crest, c0)))
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)

comment: A sufficient condition for " ` F ` being a measurable function w.r.t. to the sigma-algebra ` S ` ". (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
